prompts: Create a sleek, metallic Pokemon with sharp blades and a fierce expression.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that combines elements of steel and dark in its design.
Generate an agile, bipedal Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a menacing look.
Design a Pokemon that uses its sharp claws for both defense and offense in battles.
Imagine a Pokemon with a striking red and gray color palette that embodies stealth and cunning.
Make a Pokemon that represents the essence of a ninja, with swift movements and sharp features.
Give me a Pokemon that can blend into its forest surroundings while still standing out with vibrant colors.
